mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wcjob LIKE '용지'
SELECT wcname, wccode FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wcjob LIKE '용지' ORDER BY wccode ASC
SELECT date, num, comid, comment, curno, jeon, jeuid FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{jicode} ORDER BY date DESC, jeon DESC
SELECT * FROM KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC, wjname ASC
SELECT a.*, b.ib FROM YOJIJUMN AS a, KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.gmcheck = 0 AND a.yjcode = b.wjcode ORDER BY a.fxamount DESC, a.yjcode ASC
SELECT COUNT(uid) FROM TMPLIST3 WHERE jutag = 0 AND (jm > 0 OR yb < 0)
SELECT COUNT(uid) FROM TMPJAB3 WHERE jutag = 0 AND (jm > 0 OR yb > 0)
SELECT a.bdate, b.uid, b.jcode, b.jname, b.jm, b.yb FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST3 AS b WHERE b.jutag = 0 AND a.uid = b.listid AND ((b.jm > 0) || (b.yb > 0))
SELECT a.*, b.jbcode FROM TMPJAB3 AS a, TMPJAB AS b WHERE a.jutag = 0 AND a.jbid = b.uid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YOJIJUMN ( jdate, yjcode, yjname, yjamount, cnumlist, gmcom, gmcheck ) VALUES ( #{jdate}, #{yjcode}, #{yjname}, #{yjamount}, #{cnumlist}, '0', '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{yjcode} ORDER BY uid DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.*, b.wjname, b.facdanga, b.halin FROM JIINOUT AS a, KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.date >= #{date1} AND a.date < #{date2} AND comid not like '1001' AND a.tprice = 0 AND a.jicode = b.wjcode ORDER BY a.comid ASC, a.date ASC, a.uid ASC
SELECT a.*, b.wjname FROM JIINOUT AS a, KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.date >= #{date1} AND a.date < #{date2} AND a.tprice <> 0 AND a.jicode = b.wjcode ORDER BY a.date ASC, a.uid ASC
SELECT facdanga FROM KSWJIJL0 WHERE wjcode = #{jcode]
SELECT date FROM JIINOUT WHERE uid = #{uid]
SELECT a.comid, b.wcname FROM JIINOUT AS a, KSWCUST0 AS b WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.comid = b.wccode
SELECT a.jicode, b.wjname FROM JIINOUT AS a, KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.jicode = b.wjcode
SELECT wjcode, wjname FROM KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC
SELECT MAX(uid) FROM JEONPYO${value}
SELECT MAX(uid) FROM JIINOUT
SELECT * FROM KSWJIJL0 WHERE wjcode = #{jicode} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{jicode} ORDER BY date DESC, uid DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JEONPYO${value} ( spcom, bname, bcode, busu, panh, myun, jnum1, jnum2, bdate, buycom, jiname, jicode, jsum, comment, JEJANUM, uid ) VALUES ( #{spcom}, #{bname}, #{bcode}, #{busu}, #{panh}, #{myun}, #{jnum1}, #{jnum2}, #{bdate}, #{buycom}, #{jiname}, #{jicode}, #{jsum}, #{comment}, #{JEJANUM}, #{uid} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{yjcode} ORDER BY uid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT curno FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{yjcode} ORDER BY date DESC, uid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.m1, a.crnum, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, b.bpanh, b.bnum FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST AS b WHERE a.uid = #{listid} AND a.listid = b.uid
SELECT a.wjname, a.wjcode, b.* FROM KSWJIJL0 AS a, JIINOUT AS b WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.wjcode = b.jicode ORDER BY b.jeon DESC, b.uid DESC
SELECT date, num, comid, comment, curno, jeon, jeuid FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{jicode} ORDER BY date DESC, jeon DESC
SELECT count(*) as count FROM KSWJIJL0

SELECT a.uid, a.wjcode, a.wjname, a.ib, a.halin, a.danga, a.facdanga, (SELECT curno FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = a.wjcode ORDER BY DATE DESC, jeon desc, uid DESC LIMIT 1) AS curno FROM KSWJIJL0 AS a ORDER BY a.ib ASC, a.wjcode ASC, a.wjname ASC LIMIT #{lm_s}, #{lm_t}
SELECT * FROM KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjname ASC
SELECT curno FROM JIINOUT WHERE jicode = #{wjcode} ORDER BY date DESC, jeon DESC, uid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT wjname, wjcode FROM KSWJIJL0 WHERE jsuns < 99 ORDER BY jsuns ASC
SELECT * FROM KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC
SELECT a.*, b.wjname FROM YONGJIMS3 AS a, KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.msdate = #{msdate} AND a.yjcode = b.wjcode AND (a.QNTY1 > 0 OR a.QNTY2 > 0 OR a.QNTY3 > 0 OR a.QNTY4 > 0) ORDER BY a.uid ASC
SELECT * FROM KSWJIJL0 WHERE ib = 0 ORDER BY wjcode ASC
SELECT jicode, SUM(num) AS nsum FROM JIINOUT WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(date), '%Y%m') = #{msdate}) AND comment LIKE '入' GROUP BY jicode
SELECT UID FROM TMPJAB WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(JBDATE), '%Y%m') = #{msdate})
SELECT * FROM TMPJAB3 WHERE JBID = #{uid} AND JUTAG <> 3
SELECT uid FROM TMPLIST2 WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(bdate), '%Y%m') = #{msdate})

CREATE TABLE jeonpyo${value} ( uid mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, bdate int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, JEJANUM int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, spcom varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, buycom varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', bname varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, bcode varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, busu int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, panh varchar(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', myun int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, jiname varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', jicode varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', jnum1 int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, jnum2 int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, jsum int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, comment varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, pcheck int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (uid) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=450 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='용지전표';
